amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Veterans Administration grants for construction of state extended care facilities by $21 million and decreases funding for HUD's housing opportunities for persons with AIDS program by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in the Congressional Record to increase VA grants to construct state extended care facilities by $21 million and offset the increase from the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program funding.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hilleary amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 200 (Roll No. 347).
